DEFAULT_TICKS_PER_INCH - Static variable in class io.github.thunderbots.lightning.hardware.Encoder
The default number of encoder ticks that measure one inch on the circumference of the wheel.
DEFAULT_TICKS_PER_REVOLUTION - Static variable in class io.github.thunderbots.lightning.hardware.Encoder
The default number of encoder ticks that measure exactly one full rotation of the motor.
downButton() - Method in class io.github.thunderbots.lightning.control.Joystick
Returns true if and only if the down-direction button on the joystick is currently being pressed.
drive(double) - Method in class io.github.thunderbots.lightning.drive.DriveSystem
Drives the robot forward with the given power.
drive - Variable in class io.github.thunderbots.lightning.opmode.SimpleOpMode
 
DRIVE_POWER_WEIGHT - Static variable in class io.github.thunderbots.lightning.drive.MecanumDrive
The relative weight of the forward vector over other vectors.
DriveMotorSet - Class in io.github.thunderbots.lightning.drive
A DriveMotorSet is a collection of motors used for the sole purpose of driving the robot.
DriveMotorSet(String[]) - Constructor for class io.github.thunderbots.lightning.drive.DriveMotorSet
Constructs a new DriveMotorSet using the motors with the given names.
driveSeconds(double, double) - Method in class io.github.thunderbots.lightning.drive.DriveSystem
Drives the robot forward with the given power and for the given time, then stops.
DriveSystem - Class in io.github.thunderbots.lightning.drive
A DriveSystem represents the motors used for driving the robot, their arrangement, and in some cases, the type of wheels attached to the motor.
DriveSystem(DriveMotorSet) - Constructor for class io.github.thunderbots.lightning.drive.DriveSystem
Constructs a new DriveSystem with the given DriveMotorSet as a base.
DriveSystem(String[]) - Constructor for class io.github.thunderbots.lightning.drive.DriveSystem
Constructs a enw DriveSystem that uses the motors with the given names.
